#summary Where to find important files and directories.

<wiki:toc max_depth="5" />

= Introduction =

It's not always obvious where to find the places that FH2 functionality is implemented in various Battlefield 2 archives, ".con" files and python files. So this will be a map showing where to look.

= FH2 Structure Map =

 * ai\
   # _aibehaviours.ai_, key file
 * binaries\
 * fh2settings\
 * levels\fhmapname\
   # server.zip
    * _init.con_, kits and more set here.
 * localization\
 * menu\
 * movies\
 * python\
   # game
 * settings\
 * clientarchives.con
 * gamelogicinit.con
 * init.con
 * serverarchives.con
 * mod.desc
 * fh2.ico
 * mod.png
 * mod_icon.png
 * changelog.txt
 * common_client.zip
 * common_server.zip
 * fonts_client.zip
 * menu_client.zip
 * menu_server.zip
 * objects_client.zip
 * objects_server.zip
   # Kits
    * Class kit setup
   # Kits/ai
    * _Objects.ai_, kit strengths.
 * objects_statics_client.zip
 * objects_statics_server.zip
 * objects_vehicles_client.zip
 * objects_vehicles_server.zip
 * objects_weapons_client.zip
 * objects_weapons_server.zip
   # Weapons
    * armament
 * shaders_client.zip

=Note to Editors=

Use [http://code.google.com/p/support/wiki/WikiSyntax#Lists lists wiki markup]. Link to sub sections on this page for descriptions or make a new page. For details .con and python files add lines numbers if possible (may depend on build) or the text of relevant line to search for.
